You, too, can save money and enjoy FRESH meats, fish, chicken, duck, goose, turkey and wild game, as well as FRESH strawberries, cranberries, sweet corn and numerous vegetables the year round. Also your own cured and smoked meats of excellent quality. A new Industry in Tomah makes all this possible as well as PROFITABLE to you. Ask any of the pleased patrons whose names appear above. Call at the Locker Plant and see for yourself. Tomah Locker Service (Improves Quality and Lowers Cost)
